titles.title: Heavy Duty Hybrid Truck Incentives Improvement Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and modify the credit for new qualified hybrid motor vehicles.
Heavy Duty Hybrid Truck Incentives Improvement Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: Heavy Duty Hybrid Truck Incentives Improvement Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) extend through 2014 the tax credit for the purchase of a new qualified hybrid motor vehicle; (2) increase the incremental cost levels for computing credit amounts for such vehicles; (3) allow a 10% credit for comparable vehicles that achieve an increased city fuel economy; and (4) allow a credit for electric vehicles with a gross vehicle weight rating of not less than 8,500 pounds.
